data.text: You righteous people should sing joyfully to Yahweh
Praise Yahweh as you play songs on the lyre/harp.
Sing a new song to him;
Yahweh always does what he says that he will do;
He loves everything that we do that is just and right.
Yahweh created everything in the sky by commanding it.
He gathered all the water into one huge mass
Everyone on the earth should revere Yahweh [DOU].
When he spoke, the world ◄was created/started to exist►.
Yahweh frustrates the things that the pagan nations decide to do.
But what Yahweh decides to do will last forever.
Yahweh blesses those nations who choose him to be their God;
Yahweh looks down from heaven and sees all us people;
from where he rules [MTY], he looks down on all the people who live on the earth.
He formed our inner beings,
It is not because a king has a great army that he is able to win battles,
It is foolish to trust that because horses are very strong
Do not forget that Yahweh watches over those who revere him,
He saves them [SYN] from dying before they should die
We trust that Yahweh will help us;
We rejoice because of what he has done for us;
Yahweh, we pray that you will always faithfully love us
